data.name: The Turing Test - Upgrade Pack
data.detailed_description:
Get the full experience of The Turing Test with The Turing Test Upgrade Pack, which will give owners of the original game complete access to the extras contained in the Collector's Edition.

The Turing Test - Upgrade Pack contains three epic pieces of DLC for gamers who can't get enough of The Turing Test, including the original soundtrack!

Original Pre-Alpha Prototype of The Turing Test

Want to see where it all started? In this pack you'll get access to the original white box prototype of The Turing Test. From this prototype you'll be able to see how the game developed from whitebox block-out to a fully fledged game.

Official Art Book

In this pack, you'll gain behind the scenes access to the development of The Turing Test in an official art book made by Bulkhead Interactive's art team. In the art book you'll see exclusive, never seen before artwork from the game as well as early behind the scenes development shots whilst the game was in pre-production. Member's of the art team breakdown the thought processes and design decisions behind the the game's characters and environments, from ideas, to concept and to final production.

The Turing Test - Original Soundtrack

In this pack you'll also receive the full version of The Turing Test Original Soundtrack (OST) for for your listening pleasure.

  • 1. Waking Up
  • 2. Welcome to Europa
  • 3. The Turing Test
  • 4. Planetarium
  • 5. Presumed Dead
  • 6. Crew Quarters
  • 7. Contact Light
  • 8. Cargo
  • 9. Violating Authority
  • 10. Faraday
  • 11. Trust
  • 12. Bio Lab
  • 13. Eternal Life
  • 14. Excavation
  • 15. We Came In Peace
  • 16. Life
  • 17. Finale

The original soundtrack was co-produced between two talented music producers, Yakobo and Sam Houghton.

data.short_description: 'The Turing Test - Upgrade Pack' contains three epic pieces of DLC for gamers who can't get enough of The Turing Test: The Official Art Book, The original pre-alpha prototype build and The Turing Test Original Soundtrack for your listening pleasure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo E6600 / Athlon 64 X2 6400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / ATI Radeon HD 5770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 7 64bit / Win 8.1 64-bit / Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-920 / A8-3870K or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 / ATI Radeon R9 280 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy The Turing Test - Upgrade Pack
